document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Least </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Rivers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">docile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">sea. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Caspian </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Least rivers docile to some sea
